tossup_question: -   –  What is the name of the graben [grah-ben] that has the highest recorded temperature on Earth?
bonus_question: -   –  When using a psychrometer and the two temperatures read are nearly identical, what conclusion would you reach?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Your instrument reading is accurate
X) A change in temperature is forecast
Y) The air has a high relative humidity
Z) The dew point temperature is very low
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) THE AIR HAS A HIGH RELATIVE HUMIDITY
